thread.title: Comedian Bill Burr Takes Down Sneakerheads and Jordan Brand in an Epic, Foul-Mouthed Rant
thread.title_full: Comedian Bill Burr Takes Down Sneakerheads and Jordan Brand in an Epic, Foul-Mouthed Rant

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Comedian Bill Burr Takes Down Sneakerheads and Jordan Brand in an Epic, Foul-Mouthed Rant
text:
On the latest episode of his weekly Monday Morning podcast, comedian and self-professed psycho Bill Burr has launched a hilariously stinging takedown of Jordan Brand and wider sneaker culture.
The comic/actor’s unfiltered, no-holds-barred approach to humor has seen him rise to the top of the U.S. stand-up circuit, and here he doesn’t miss with a withering assessment of sneakerheads. “I f*cking hate sneakerheads. I fucking can’t stand them with their thousand f*cking pairs of sneakers…taking them out of the box on MTV Cribs and licking the sole,” remarks Burr, before offering his best impersonation. “I never even wore these joints before,’ yeah, I can tell from your f*cking man t*ts.”
Burr then goes on to single out Nike Kobe 11 (“they’re like referee sneakers from the f*cking early ’80s”) and Air Jordan wearers (“the amount of f*cking dopes that wear Air Jordans”) for some special treatment. Listen to the epic rant below.

Speaking of Jordans, here’s a first look at the KAWS x AJ4 .
